topics.body:
you know, characters who are just good people are really underrated
and i hate the response of, no one in real life is this good, we need characters who are all cynical and assholes, because that's what real life is like

how about fuck you
how about instead of saying that nobody acts like that, we strive to be those good people
the world won't change if you won't make an effort to try
